extension.description: This add-on let you browse and watch educational content from UR, the Swedish Educational Broadcasting Company. UR Play is Sweden's most knowledge-packed Play Service with more than 2,500 programs on everything from history to math and language. The content is aimed at a Swedish audience and might not be available for other countries.
Denna add-on gör det möjligt att se innehåll från UR Play (urplay.se). UR Play är Sveriges mest kunskapsspäckade Playtjänst med mer än 2500 program om allt från historia till matematik och språk.
extension.disclaimer: This is an unofficial addon and it is not supported or maintained by UR (Utbildningsradion). Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws before installing.
